message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $80?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I've got some costs associated with this product. I can do $90, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate it. Would you consider selling the product to me for $85?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $92.50
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses down. Could you possibly lower the price to $90?
